name: RC vs RC — Radio Control Car
name_original: RC vs RC — Radio Control Car
description:
Welcome to tug-of-war on cars,
You got into games - wheelbarrows against wheelbarrows!

Here, only the epic wheelbarrows against, the game of cars against cars.
Car vs car 5 different cars, you can play with friends while battling on radio-controlled cars.
Radio control machine is like in childhood, because we all dreamed of toy cars on the remote control, but here the dream is realized.
Wheelbarrows against wheelbarrows, a game about cars, a game about the game - it sounds paradoxical? That's not, cool design, action, models will convince this.
Toy cars on the remote control will not let you be bored.

Do you want a one-on-one race? Come on, come on!
